page.title: 12Canterbury Entertainment (2)
page.content: If you like{music,}you can hear {concerts}performed in various local churches and often at the Cathedral itself. In summer there are attractions such as King's Week when the King's School puts on a week of shows and concerts, Speedway (motor cycle racing) on Saturday evenings and also county cricket matches at St.Lawrence. In August there is the usual {carnival}when you can see the gaily decorated floats processing down the High Street. In September there is the Canterbury {Festival}which is three weeks of concerts, drama, music, dance and exhibitions. In the High Street you can see buskers, jesters and break dancers. What an exciting time one can have!
